#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define lld long long int
#define gx getchar
#define pb push_back
#define in insert
#define mp make_pair
#define inf 2000000000
#define mod 1000000007

void scan(int &x)
{
    register int c = gx();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gx());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gx())
    {
        x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;
    }
}
lld modu(lld a,lld b,lld c)
{
	lld res=1;
	while(b>0)
	{
		if(b&1)
			res=(res*a)%c;
		b=b>>1;
		a=(a*a)%c;
	}
	return res%c;
}
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	long double t,n,m,k,val,cur;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>k>>m;
		val=0;
		if(n*k>m)
			cout<<val<<endl;
		else
		{
			cur=n;
			while(cur*k<=m)
			{
				val++;
				cur=cur*k;
			}
			cout<<val<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
